sgfx::FontSystem Class Reference

Documentation

This class is used to manage fonts that are installed on the system.

Static Public Member Functions

static bool load_fonts (const sg_font_ref_t *fonts, int count)

bool  bold = false 
)
static

Load the system font that most closely matches the specified characteristics

Parameters
hThe target font height. This is a maximum height unless h is small than all system fonts
boldWhether or not to use a bold font
Returns
static bool sgfx::FontSystem::load_fonts ( const sg_font_ref_t *  fonts,
int  count 
)
static

This sets the system font pointer. This function is needed in order for load_system_font() to function.

Parameters
fontsA pointer to a table that holds the system fonts
Returns
True if all fonts loaded successfully
